Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #22 Clark Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #152 Addison Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
